channel.title: Can someone figure this out?

item.title: Can someone figure this out?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I’m trying to add a thing, not telling what and I get these errors;

client.java:43: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcHandler location: class client int follow = npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].followPlayer; ^ client.java:46: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcHandler location: class client npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = false; ^
And this is a part of the code where the errors are int follow = npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].followPlayer; int playerX = server.playerHandler.players[follow].absX; int playerY = server.playerHandler.players[follow].absY; npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = false;
I don’t get it, what’s wrong?

Read full topic
